end else begin select @r = min(ln) from #k where i = 0 and (ma_ca = '' or ma_ca not in (select ma_ca from hrdmca))&Error; end delete #k where i = 0 while exists(select 1 from #k) begin update #k set ma_ca = ltrim(right(ma_ca, len(ma_ca) - i)) update #k set i = charindex(',', ma_ca) if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount;
